page.title: 14SURVEY ON LEISURE,GATLEY
page.content: FROM THE RESULTS OF OUR SURVEY IT APPEARS THAT THE CHILDREN OF GATLEY PRIMARY SCHOOL AND THEIR PARENTS ENJOY THEIR SPARE TIME.A NUMBER OF UNUSUAL LEISURE TIME ACTIVITIES SUCH AS BEEKEEPING,ARCHAEOLOGY AND WARGAMING OCCUPIED SOME PEOPLE. SPORT AND OTHER OUTDOOR ACTIVITIES WERE BY FAR THE MOST POPULAR WAY OF SPENDING LEISURE TIME FOR FAMILIES AND FOR DADS.MUMS,HOWEVER,PREFERRED HANDICRAFTS AND READING AS THEIR MAIN INTERESTS. THOUGH NO DADS RECORDED SWIMMING AS THEIR MAIN LEISURE ACTIVITY IT WAS THE SINGLE MOST POPULAR FAMILY ACTIVITY. TRAVEL AND OUTINGS WITH THE FAMILY REMAIN POPULAR WHILE ONE DAD REPLIED THAT EATING WAS HIS MAIN PLEASURE!
